import React,{ useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../reducers/productReducer' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = () => { useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProduct = async()=>{ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${id}`) setProduct(data) } },[]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 {product.description} Price: $ {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
